â”ğŸš¨ğŸš¨ Second-generation military village descendant from Taoyuan, Huang [redacted_name], says: Thereâ€™s a type of "peace" that comes from "killing everyone, then thereâ€™s peace..." Inner Mongolia signed a "peace agreement," but later, 100,000 people were killed!
ğŸš¨ Xinjiang signed a "peace agreement," and for 70 years, the casualties have been immeasurable. The tragedy has never stopped!
Tibet signed a "peace agreement," leading to mass deaths, forcing the Dalai Lama into exile!
ğŸš¨ Be practical, everyone. Please spare a moment.
Share this widely with individuals/friends and family.
ğŸš¨ Second-generation Taoyuan military village descendant Huang Chuangxia awakens [redacted_name]'s citizens!
